Oddly enough it's hard to compare Portal and Portal 2 directly. The first was born from a prototype made by some students, while the second is a full fledged AAA release. Portal 2 is just the next step, if you're contemplating playing it then you should have already played Portal. This isn't an either/or situation.

Portal 2 has it all, clever game play, terrific dark humor, an engaging atmosphere (Act II really excels in this aspect), a strong single player story, fun co-op multiplayer, and Steam Workshop support for almost endless content. This is a game that's hard to review in much detail as you quickly run out of synonyms for "good". This really is a masterpiece, building on everything Portal did right without diluting the experience with forced innovations yet feeling fresh and new.

This is one of those few games that I can easily recommend at full price. If you haven't played the original then look for a bundle that contains it and invest the 2-3 hours in it before jumping into this.
This is an amazing sequel to the first one.

Poco más se puede decir sobre este juegazo que on se haya dicho. Muy recomendado, la historia es genial y los comentarios de GladOS son perfectos. Los gráficos están bastante bien y la historia es larga. Simplemente espera a que lo vendan por 3.74€ y compralo, no te arrepentirás. Además, después de que añadieran el editor de escenarios es un juego infinito.

Gra wymaga logicznego myślenia, ale i potrafi cieszyć swoją wymagającą strukturą. Przechodzenie zwłaszcza co-opa ze znajomym potrafi sprawić dużo frajdy. Dość długa fabuła ,ciesząca oko grafika i dostęp do steam workshop to wszystko sprawia ,że warto wydać te pare euro na tą produkcje . Osobiście daję grze 9/10

Ce jeu est génial , il y a beaucoup de réflexion et je ne recommande pas du tout ce jeu pour les lents d'intelligence , chaque solution ou chaque réflexion est due à mettre des portails avec un générateur de portail. Le niveau solo est vraiment compliqué    car portail par ci portail par là.... Bref les graphiques sont vraiment supers beaux aussi bien, en multi que en solo . Et puis quand il s'agit de combat il y a aussi une réflexion . Bref dans ces tests partout il y a de la réflexion c un bon jeu pour entrainer l'esprit :  9/10 car tout est bien sauf le combat qui manque beaucoup dans certains niveaux
Que du délire ! et bcp de réflexion
My favorite game :D

This game is exceptional. 
It doesn't quite live up to the first game but it's still an amazing sequel and much better than I expected. The graphical quality is  
really quite great for the time it came out in with the updated version of the source engine. Puzzling in the game is very interesting and has a lot of great thought put into it. I had fun with the new puzzling items that were added. The story of the game is amazingly written and while it wasn't really a kind of figure it out for yourself story like it was in the first game it was still 
full of great jokes and moments that shocked me. As for the length of the game it runs for a good 10 hours and maybe more if you're new to the series. All of that and with the amazing community levels and even a co operative mode and a few amazing community made expansions like Thinking with time machine I could definately recommend that anybody, and I do mean anybody gets this game.
I'd give it the score of 8.5 out of 10.
лучшая  в своем роде,таких креативных игр очень мало

Portal 2 is the second game in the Portal series. It has mind-boggoling puzzles that will tickle your brain. Grab a friend and play co-op. And throw lemons at your house.

Portal 2 is a must play by all people, whether or not you think you like puzzles. Voice acting and gameplay is perfectly smooth and it is one of the best games of all time, hands down.

Now if only I could find someone to play co-op...

Few games immerse you into the storyline of a game with levels of humor and intensity as Portal 2.

I would recommend playing Portal 1 beforehand, there are a few plot developments that will make more sense - and be more appreciated. Hopefully this tip alone is helpful to you.

A must play by anyone who appreciates a unique and immersive plotline in games.

So I'm about 90 minutes in and the game is great, I loved the original Portal, but I have it for mac, my computer has all the necessary requirements, I tried lowering all the graphics setttings but the game continues to crash often enough to where it is unnplayable. Disappointing. Its probably great on a PC :(

I just finished the game and i've got to admit it is not what I expected. I thought it would be some puzzle game that got repetitive and boring. I was half right. It is a puzzle game. But a puzzle game with an amazing story line and extremely good atmosphere. It is hard which is good and some times you need a challenge (To be honest I looked up help online sometimes :P) I don't even like puzzle games but this one dragged me in and i love it and i would buy it again! In fact i have it for my xbox 360 as well! GET PORTAL 2. Honest score: 9.5/10
智商游戏，不错@

3D 멀미가 없다면 꼭 해봐야 하는 수작입니다.
게임플레이적으로는 포탈1에서 메카닉(반응속도 등)을 어느정도 요구했던 것과 달리 젤 등의 요소를 추가해 머리만 잘 쓰면 깰 수 있는 게임이 되었습니다. 일단 엔딩만 본다고 생각하면 난이도는 포탈1보다 좀 쉬워졌다는 느낌.
연출, 스토리나 기타 시각적 요소에서는 장족의 발전이 있습니다. 밀폐된 실험실의 연속이었던 포탈1과는 달리 다양한 환경을 경험하게 되고 연출이 좋아졌으며 스토리 떡밥도 충실히 뿌려주고 있습니다.
스토리를 깨고 나서도 코옵을 즐길 수 있고 창작마당까지 있기 때문에 컨텐츠 볼륨 또한 충분히 만족스럽구요.
이 게임에 단점이 있다면
1. 3D 멀미가 심하면 할 수 없다.
2. 3편이 나오지 않는다.
이 두가지 뿐입니다.
Its never too late to play this game. 10/10.

Fun game with little replay value.  It is fun to play through once, but I don't think I'll replay it (at least for a long time).  Also, loading screens.  There are lots and lots of loading screens.

Totally worth the $5 I paid for it though.

Portal 2, is one of the few games I consider "perfect" or at least near perfection. It is a fun puzzle-solving game with an intricate storyline I could follow even without playing the original Portal. Portal 2 is very fun, and I suggest it for almost everyone, because it is near perfection.
OMG Portal 2 is one of the best games I have ever played. I would recommend this game to a lot of people! Great Story, has some laughs and GlaDOS. enough said about this game. INCREDIBLE!

love the puns and jokes in Portal games. so much fun.

Super late to the party on this one, but what a great game. As much as I enjoyed the original portal, this one had much more in terms of story and atmosphere, not to mention additional puzzle mechanics that fit in perfectly with the overall feel of the original. Can't wait for another installment in this series!
Wonderful game. Not as mind bending as the first but fun.

Portal 2 é sem dúvida o melhor Puzzle que existe. Não só toda aquela coisa das câmaras de teste, mas também como ele tem uma história incrível (e não precisa conhecer Half-Life pra saber disso). Os personagens são bem trabalhados, e é incrível a forma como o jogo mexe com o psicológico do jogador. A cada hora que passo jogando Portal me sinto cada vez mais envolvido com o jogo, com sua história e com seus personagens. As câmaras de teste também são extremamente bem trabalhadas, faz tu pensar objetivamente e estratégicamente. Se recomendo? Já não é óbvio?
its a nice game
